titles.title: To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 relating to an urban mobility project for New York City, New York.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2052-2053)
Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

bill.summary: 8/6/1993--Introduced. Amends the Intermodal surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to deauthorize improvements on Miller highway in New York City, New York, and instead authorize improvements to the 72nd Street station of the Interborough Rapid Transit line located at the intersection of West 72nd Street and Broadway, in an equal amount.
